p: Fresh plant materials required for PHAF were collected from Colombo (6° 55′ 54.98″ N x 79° 50′ 52.01″ E) Western province, Sri Lanka, and authenticated by the Curator of National Herbarium of Peradeniya, Sri Lanka. The plant materials were identified and authenticated by Prof. M. H. A. Tissera, Professor in Dravyaguna, Department of Dravyaguna, Gampaha Wickramarachchi Ayurveda Institute, University of Kelaniya, Yakkala, Sri Lanka. A voucher specimen from each plant (PHAF1-7) was deposited at Department of Kaumarabruthya and Stree Roga, Gampaha Wickramarachchi Ayurveda Institute, University of Kelaniya, Yakkala, Sri Lanka, for future reference.
